TopicTitle: How many fuel tanks can YOUR computer take?

Articles.Content:
Put fuel tanks on your rocket until your computer can take it no more!

Mine takes 205 fuel tanks, 42 launch towers, and 6 struts, and run at 60 FPS still!

How would one define 'take no more'?

Are we talking about crashing the game, dipping below X FPS, or what?
I would say drop below 2 fps for 10 seconds.
You should probably state system specs too.

345 fuel tanks at maximum graphic, 720p with 8x AA..

It runs at 0.2 FPS while recording.. After I look at the sky it increases to 10ish...

When the engines fire.. Well I think Uniti Crashes... And I just hear my fans hitting higher gear..

What cpu/gpu\'s though?

AMD 3.0 Ghz x2 6mb Cache

ATI Radeon 4650, 1Gb GDDR 3 memory..

6 Gb DDR2 @ 1333Mhz Ram...
